main event: On 4 July 1948, a couple in Dravosburg, Pennsylvania observed an object resembling a star moving silently through the sky.
interesting points: The object moved across the sky, stopping and changing direction several times., The observer initially mistook the object for a plane but noted it made no noise., The sighting occurred around the same time as other reports of unidentified flying objects in the area., The witness emphasized that the object resembled a star closely when it was stationary., The report also references another incident involving two women who saw a 'big silver plate' in the vicinity.
witness description: a couple observing the sky from their lawn
